title: Coconut and Black Bean Soup
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin black beans', '1 (400ml) tin reduced fat coconut milk', '175g frozen green peas', '475ml chicken stock or water', '1 tablespoon fresh lime juice', 'garlic granules to taste', 'onion powder to taste', 'sugar to taste', 'chilli powder to taste', 'ground cumin to taste']
